member.name: T:Codemerx.jqGrid.Tools.jqGridDataFrame
member.summary: jqGridDataFrame stores all the data send back as a response to jqGrid AJAX data request.
member.remarks: Create an instance of this class providing all the data required by the constructors. Then use the method to get the data back in JSON format. The resulting string can then be sent back as a reply to jqGri AJAX data request.

member.name: M:Codemerx.jqGrid.Tools.jqGridDataFrame.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,Codemerx.jqGrid.Tools.JSONGridRow[],System.Collections.Hashtable)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of
member.param: The number of data page to display in jqGrid
The total number of data records currently bound to jqGrid.
The total number of pages in jqGrid.
An array of objects. Each object represents a single row of data displayed by jqGrid.
Used to send custom data together with the response. jqGrid will not automatically display that data. It could be accessed by custome javascrpt code on the client side, though.

member.name: M:Codemerx.jqGrid.Tools.jqGridDataFrame.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,Codemerx.jqGrid.Tools.JSONGridRow[],System.Collections.Hashtable,System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of
member.param: The number of the data page to display in jqGrid when this data frame is received.
The total number of data records currently bound to jqGrid.
The total number of pages in jqGrid.
An array of objects. Each object represents a single row of data displayed by jqGrid.
Used to send custom data together with the response. jqGrid will not automatically display that data. It could be accessed by custome javascrpt code on the client side, though.
A used to do the JSON serialization. Using ths parameter custom serialization properties can be provided

member.name: T:Codemerx.jqGrid.Tools.JSONGridRow
member.summary: Represents a jqGrid row in the data send back as a response to jqGrid AJAX data request.

members.member:
Initilizes a new instance of .
The unique ID of the jqGrid row represented by this instance of An array of objects representing the cell values of the jqGrid row represented by this instance of .The number of elements in this array should equal the number of columns defined in jqGrid colModel.

member.name: P:Codemerx.jqGrid.Tools.JSONGridRow.id
member.summary: The unique ID of the jqGrid row represented by this instance of

member.name: P:Codemerx.jqGrid.Tools.JSONGridRow.cell
member.summary: An array of objects representing the cell values of the jqGrid row represented by this instance of . The number of elements in this array should equal the number of columns defined in jqGrid colModel.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.AddEventArgs
member.summary: The Adding event stores information about the added gri row in this class.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.AddEventArgs.NewColumnValues
member.summary: A dictionary where the data source column name is the key and the user assigned value to that column is the value.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.DeleteEventArgs
member.summary: The Deleting event stores the deletion information in an instance of this class.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.DeleteEventArgs.RowID
member.summary: The unique ID of the row to be deleted as assigned by Codemerx jqGrid when sending the data to the browser.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.EditEventArgs
member.summary: The Editing event stores information about the grid row edit in this class.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.EditEventArgs.RowID
member.summary: The unique ID of the row to be modified as assigned by Codemerx jqGrid when sending the data to the browser.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.EditEventArgs.NewColumnValues
member.summary: A dictionary where the data source column name is the key and the user assigned value to that column is the value.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.EditEventArgs.OriginalColumnValues
member.summary: A dictionary where the data source column name is the key and the value originally displayed to the user for that column is the value.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.PagingEventArgs
member.summary: The Paging event uses this calss to store all the sorting properties.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.PagingEventArgs.PageNumber
member.summary: The page number.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.PagingEventArgs.PageSize
member.summary: The number of rows the page contains.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.SearchEventArgs
member.summary: The Searching event stores all the search properties in an instance of this class.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.SearchEventArgs.SearchGroup
member.summary: The storing the search data as provided by the user.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.SearchGroup
member.summary: Defines the search conditions, i.e. the search operators (e.g. 'begibs with') and search strings (e.g. 'John'), for a set of columns together with the logical operator (e.g. AND) used to combine these search conditions.
member.remarks: A search group can also contain one or more SearchGroups. That allows expressing complex searches of the kind ColumnA == 'a' AND (ColumnB == true OR ColumnC == true). ColumnA == 'a' will be a SearchGroup that contains another SearchGroup for ColumnB == true OR ColumnC == true.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.SearchGroup.LogicalOperator
member.summary: The logical operator (AND or OR) used to combine the search conditions in the SearchGroup.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.SearchGroup.ColumnsSearchConditions
member.summary: A dictionary which has column names for keys and the search condition provided by the user for the respective column name for values.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.SearchGroup.SearchGroups
member.summary: A list of SearchGroups combined with this SearchGroup via the LogicalOperator.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.SortingEventArgs
member.summary: The sorting event uses this calss to store all the sorting properties.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.SortingEventArgs.ColumnsSortOrders
member.summary: A which keys are column data source fields. The values are instances of enumeration.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.SortingEventArgs.ReplacementSortExpression
member.summary: If set to a value different than empty string the grid will use this expression to perform sorting. Otherwise the grid will c onstruct its own sort expression.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.UpdatedEventArgs
member.summary: Stores information about grid data update (add/edit/delete).

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.UpdatedEventArgs.Exception
member.summary: The exception that might have occurred when performing the update operation that raised this event. NULL if no exception occurred.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.UpdatedEventArgs.Handled
member.summary: The event handler sets this to true if it handles the exception. If not set to true the exception will be rethrown. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Events.UpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows
member.summary: The number of rows in the datasource that got changed as a result of the update operation.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.LogicalOperator
member.summary: A list of logical operators used in various scenarios by Codemerx jqGrid.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.EditProperties
member.summary: Exposes a number of properties that allow setting up editing the grid data.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.StateManagingItem
member.summary: Internal class supporting Codemerx jqGrid infrastrucutre. Not intended for external usage.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.Utilities.IDirtyStateManager
member.summary: Internal class supporting Codemerx jqGrid infrastrucutre. Not intended for external usage.

member.name: M:Codemerx.WebForms.StateManagingItem.SetDirty
member.summary: Explicitly marks the view state as changed. Thus the view state will be recorded and sent to the client side even if no changes occurred.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.StateManagingItem.IsTrackingViewState
member.summary: If true any changes made to the item will be recorded in the view state.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.EditProperties.EditOnClick
member.summary: If true the contents of a given grid cell can be edited when the cell is clicked on. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.EditProperties.ToolbarEnabled
member.summary: If set to true various data manipulation buttons will be displayed in jqGrid pager. This option has no effect if jqGrid pager is not displayed (). Default value is true.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.EditProperties.DisplayAdd
member.summary: If true an 'Add' button appears in jqGrid pager and allows adding new rows to the grid. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.EditProperties.DisplayDelete
member.summary: If true an 'Delete' button appears in jqGrid pager and allows deleting grid rows. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.EditProperties.DisplayEdit
member.summary: If true an 'Edit' button appears in jqGrid pager and allows editing grid rows. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.EditProperties.DisplayView
member.summary: If true an 'View' button appears in jqGrid pager and allows detailed viewing grid rows. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.EditProperties.DisplayRefresh
member.summary: If true an 'Refresh' button appears in jqGrid pager and allows refreshing grid. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.EditProperties.DisplaySearch
member.summary: If true an 'Search' button appears in jqGrid pager and allows searching grid data. Default value is true.

member.summary: Defines the size of a page of data in Codemerx jqGrid.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.SelectItem.Item
member.summary: A string in the format Label:Value. Label will get displayed in teh select control and Value will be posted to the server when Label is selected.

member.summary: A collection of view state aware items that might in turn be also such collections. Exposes standard collection methods.

member.summary: Internal class supporting Codemerx jqGrid infrastrucutre. Not intended for external usage.

member.summary: Internal class supporting Codemerx jqGrid infrastrucutre. Not intended for external usage.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Column.ColumnCssClass
member.summary: "The CSS Class to be applied only to this column, if any.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Column.DataSourceField
member.summary: The name of the data source column that provides the values in this column.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Column.Hidden
member.summary: If true HTML markup for the column will be generated but the grid will not display the column.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Column.Editable
member.summary: If true the column will be editable.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Column.Title
member.summary: A custom title to be displayed as a column header. By default the data source field name will be displayed there.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Column.DataSourcePrimaryKey
member.summary: True if the data source field for this column is a primary key.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Column.Resizable
member.summary: If true the user will be able to resize the column.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Column.Searchable
member.summary: If false searches on this column contents will be impossible.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Column.DefaultSearchValue
member.summary: The default search string to be displayed for this column when the user initiates search.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Column.SearchOperators
member.summary: The search operations applicable to this colum, e.g. 'begins with', 'greater than', etc.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Column.SearchControlType
member.summary: The type of search this column supports. If TextBox gets chosen the user can supply random search string. DropDown provides a finite set of predefined choices.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Column.SearchSelectControlConstants
member.summary: The possible search values in the dropdown if SearchControlType is DropDown. Ignored otherwise.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Column.ToolTip
member.summary: If ture a tooltip will be shown when hovering over a cell in this column.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Column.Sortable
member.summary: If true the user can sort the grid based on this column.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Column.TextAlign
member.summary: The alignment of the text in the column.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.Column.Width
member.summary: The column width.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.SearchControlType
member.summary: Defines the types of controls that can be used in search.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.DataDisplayProperties
member.summary: Exposes a number of settings that define how Codemerx jqGrid displays the data it is bound to.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.DataDisplayProperties.Viewrecords
member.summary: If true jqGrid will display the total number of records in the pager bar.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.DataDisplayProperties.PagingProperties
member.summary: A collection of all the settings affecting jqGrid paging.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.DataDisplayProperties.SortingProperties
member.summary: A collection of all the settings affecting jqGrid sorting.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.DataDisplayProperties.AutoEncode
member.summary: If true the grid HTML encodes the incoming and posted data. Corresponds to jqGrid option 'autoencode'.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.DataDisplayProperties.TextDirectionRightToLeft
member.summary: If set to true jqGrid displays text right to left. Default value is false. Corresponds to jqGrid option 'direction'.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.DataDisplayProperties.NumberRows
member.summary: If set to true an additional column showing the row number is added to the grid. Default value is false. Correspons to jqGrid option 'rownumbers'.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.InColumnSearchProperties
member.summary: The values of the properties of this class define the set up of Codemerx jqGrid in column search.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.InColumnSearchProperties.ShowAlways
member.summary: If true the grid will always display an extra row of text/select input fields which values could be used to search the gird data.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.InColumnSearchProperties.SearchOnEnter
member.summary: If true the search will start when 'Enter' is pressed in the search field. Otherwise search will start immediately when a new character is typed in the search field.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.InColumnSearchProperties.DisplaySearchOperators
member.summary: Displays a selection of in each column for the user to choose from when searching. The search actions available for each column are taken from . By default all search actions are enabled in .

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.InColumnSearchProperties.DefaultSearchAction
member.summary: The search action to be applied if nothing gets chosen explicitly by the user. By default this is set to "Begins With".

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.InColumnSearchProperties.GroupingOperator
member.summary: Defines the logical grouping of the search values for the grid columns. By default this is set to AND.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.PagingProperties
member.summary: Holds various properties that define COdemerx jqGrid paging behavior.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.PagingProperties.CurrentPage
member.summary: The number of the page to be displayed in jqGrid.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.PagingProperties.Pager
member.summary: If true jqGrid will display a pager.
member.remarks: The pager is a collection of UI elements that enable navigation in paged data. Using the pager one could open the next or previous page or jump to a random page .

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.PagingProperties.PageSize
member.summary: Specifies how many records should be placed on each jqGrid page.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.PagingProperties.PageSizePicker
member.summary: Specifies the possible page sizes the user will be able to choose from in the jqGrid pager.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.PagingProperties.VirtualScroll
member.summary: When set to a value different than VirtualScrollKind.None enables scroll virtualization in the grid. Default value is VirtualScrollKind.None. Correspons to jqGrid option 'scroll'.
member.remarks: With scroll virtualization enabled the user experience is the same as if all the avalable data is loaded initially and one can just scroll up and down through it. Paging can be disabled in this mode. In order for this to work in the background the grid requests new pages of data from the server when the scroll position changes. If this property is set to VirtualScrollKind.Dynamic the grid keeps on the client side only the last page of data loaded. If set to VirtualScrollKind.AllRowsUpToCurrentPosition the gri keeps on the client side all the data pages up to the current scroll position.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.SearchOperatorHolder
member.summary: Holds a search operator supported by jqGrid, e.g. 'begins with','greater than', etc.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.SearchOperator
member.summary: A search operator supported by jqGrid

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.SortingProperties
member.summary: Defines the sorting properties of Codemerx jqGrid.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.SortingProperties.MultiSort
member.summary: If true jqGrid can be sorted on more than one column. Otherwise jqGrid can be sorted on singel column only.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.SortingProperties.ColumnsInitialSortOrder
member.summary: Determines which columns should be sorted and in what direction.

remarks.para: The value should be used as a key in this dictionary. should be used as value.
Putting more than one value in will not have effect unless is set to true.

The columns will be sorted in the same order they are added to this dictionary, i.e. if column A is added first and column B second then A will be sorted first and then B will be sorted preserving the sorting of A.
To set this value in ASP.NET markup use the following format "ColumnName1 asc, ColumnName2 desc,...."

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.VisualProperties
member.summary: The properties of this class define the appearance of Codemerx jqGrid.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.VisualProperties.Language
member.summary: Use CultureInfo.ThreeLetterISOLanguageName value to set this property. Supports ISO639-2 values

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.VisualProperties.Theme
member.summary: Choses one of the predefined CSS themes to apply to this instance of jqGrid.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.VisualProperties.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets the grid caption.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.VisualProperties.AutoHeight
member.summary: If ture jqGrid will set its height to the smallest possible value that makes vertical scroll unnecessary.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.VisualProperties.AlternatingRowColor
member.summary: If set to true two different colors will be used for row background and no two adjacent rows will have the same color. False by default. Corresponds to jqGrid option 'altRows'.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.VisualProperties.AutoWidth
member.summary: If true the grid width is set to the width of the parent element. This happens upon initialization only and does not automatically reflect changes later on in application lifetime. Dfault value is false. Corresponds to jqGrid option 'autowidth'.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.VisualProperties.GridEmptyMessage
member.summary: The custom message to be displayed inside the grid when the server returns 0 rows of data.Corresponds to jqGrid option 'emptyrecords'.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.VisualProperties.ForceFitColumns
member.summary: If set to true when a column width gets changed by the user the other column widths change accordingly so that no horizontal scrollbar is needed. Default value is false. Corresponds to jqGrid option 'forceFit'.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.VisualProperties.ShowCollapsed
member.summary: If set to true initially just the grid caption and an expander are visible. No data is loaded at this point. The gri gets displayed and the data loaded when the user clcks on the expander. Default value is false. Corresponds to jqGrid option 'hiddengrid'.
member.remarks: The Caption property must have a value for this property to function correctly.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.VisualProperties.ShowExpandCollapseButton
member.summary: If set to true an expander is displayed next to the grid caption that allows expanding and collapsing the grid rows. Default value is false. Corresponds to jqGrid option 'hidegrid'.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.VisualProperties.HooverCursorOverRows
member.summary: If set to false there is no visible effect of hoovering over the grid rows.Default value is true. Corresponds to jqGrid option 'hoverrows'.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.VisualProperties.LoadingMessage
member.summary: The custom message to display while loading data from the server. Corresponds to jqGrid option 'loadtext'.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.GridProperties.VisualProperties.BlockOnLoad
member.summary: If true all actions on the grid will be disabled while loading data. Default value is false. Corresponds to jqGrid option 'loadui:block'.

member.name: M:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.IsBindableType(System.Type)
member.summary: Similarly to Microsoft Web Forms controls IsBindableType methods overriding this method enables automatically filtering what data types the grid can display. If this method returns true on the data type of a data source schema field a grid column will get generated for that field. Otherwise the grid will not display that field.

member.name: E:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.Editing
member.summary: Raised after new values for an edited row are submitted to the server but BEFORE anything gets written to the database

member.name: E:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.Edited
member.summary: Raised after new values for an edited row are written to the database

member.name: E:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.Deleting
member.summary: Raised after a delete request is submitted to the server but BEFORE anything gets written to the database

member.name: E:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.Deleted
member.summary: Raised after a delete is executed in the database

member.name: E:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.Adding
member.summary: Raised after a new data row is submitted to the server but BEFORE anything gets written to the database

member.name: E:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.Added
member.summary: Raised after a new data row is written to the database

member.name: E:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.Searching
member.summary: Raised BEFORE the grid searches the data based on the user provided search criteria.

member.name: E:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.Sorting
member.summary: Raised BEFORE the grid sorts the data.

member.name: E:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.Paging
member.summary: Raised BEFORE the grid pages the data.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.Columns
member.summary: The grid columns.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.DataURL
member.summary: The URL that the grid uses to requet data. Setting this to a custom value allows manuallly parsing requests and sending data to the grid. The default value lets each instance of Codemerx jqGrid handle its own data requests automatically using the data source it is bound to.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.EditURL
member.summary: The URL that the grid uses to send edit/add/delete requests. Setting this to a custom value allows manual handling of these requests. The default value lets each instance of Codemerx jqGrid handle these requests automatically using the data source it is bound to.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.LoadOnce
member.summary: If true all the data is sent to the client side on the first request. Any further manipulations to the data (e.g. paging, sorting, filtering, search, etc.) are done on the client side.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.MultiSelect
member.summary: If true the grid allows selecting more than one row. Default value is false. Corresponds to jqGrid option 'multiselect'.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.AddjQueryJSToPage
member.summary: If true the jQuery version used by Codemerx jqGrid will be added to the page where the grid resides. jQuery should be manually added to page for Codemerx jqGrid to function properly if this property is set to false. true by default.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.AddjqGridJSToPage
member.summary: If true the jqGrid Javascript code will be added to the page where Codemerx jqGrid resides. If set to false a version of jqGrid source should be manually added to page for Codemerx jqGrid to function properly. true by default.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.AddjqGridCSSToPage
member.summary: If true the jqGrid CSS file will be added to the head of the page. If false a version of the jqGrid CSS file should be manually added to the page for Codemerx jqGrid to function properly. true by default.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.AddjQueryThemeToPage
member.summary: If true a JQuery CSS theme file will be added to the head of the page. If false a version of the JQuery CSS theme should be manually added to the page for Codemerx jqGrid to function properly. true by default.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.AddjqGridLocaleToPage
member.summary: If true the jqGrid locale Javascript file will be added to the head of the page. If false a version of the jqGrid locale Javascript file should be manually added to the page for Codemerx jqGrid to function properly. true by default.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.DataDisplayProperties
member.summary: A collection of properties defining how jqGrid displays data.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.VisualProperties
member.summary: A collection of properties defining how jqGrid looks like.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.InColumnSearchProperties
member.summary: A collection of properties defining how jqGrid in column search behaves when enabled.

member.name: P:Codemerx.WebForms.jqGrid.EditProperties
member.summary: A collection of properties defining the appearance and behavior of jqGrid navigation.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.ThemerollerThemes
member.summary: The JQuery Themeroller themes provided by Codemerx jqGrid.

member.name: T:Codemerx.WebForms.VirtualScrollKind
member.summary: The virtual scrolling modes supported by Codemerx jqGrid.
